docstring.long_description:
Logs CAN data to an ASAM Measurement Data File v4 (.mf4) as specified by the ASAM MDF standard (see https://www.asam.net/standards/detail/mdf/).

MF4Writer does not support append mode.
docstring.short_description: Create a writer for the MF4 format.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The name of the file to output.

parameters.name: database
parameters.description: Path to a DBC or ARXML file that contains message description.

parameters.name: compression_level
parameters.description: The compression level to use. Defaults to "No compression".

returns.description: A stateful object that can be used to write CAN data to the file.
